Koko is a second-year ScM student at [Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, Department of Genetic Epidemiology](https://www.jhsph.edu/). She is also a graduate research assistant for the [Wendy Klag Center for Autism and Developmental Disabilities](https://www.wendyklagcenter.org/).

In her free time, she loves to hike, bake, indoor cycle, go to solidcore, and travel the world!
